abstract: The dust-up comes after the companies agreed that Netflix could pay Verizon to connect directly to its network, creating a faster connection that bypasses the go-between that carries most content through the Internet.
snippet: The dust-up comes after the companies agreed that Netflix could pay Verizon to connect directly to its network, creating a faster connection that bypasses the go-between that carries most content through the Internet.
lead_paragraph: Verizon fired back at Netflix on Thursday after it was revealed that Netflix showed its customers an error message blaming Verizon’s network for slowing the streaming of Netflix’s programming.

headline.main: Verizon Challenges Netflix’s Warning Messages Blaming It for Slow Streaming Service
headline.print_headline: Verizon Challenges Netflix’s Warning Messages Blaming It for Slow Streaming Service
